column4: I keep seeing "to retrieve share list from server" when trying to browse samba shared on Jaunty. HELP!!!!!!!!!!1111
try with smbclient from the server, then from the client, that will help to narrow the problem, i have been through this too many times.
use both the anonymous connection and your username share if you have one.
I can mount Samba shares just fine.
The problem is just with Nautilus.
I can not browse the workgroups.
i don't even know what nautilus is, but i do know how samba works, very well.
WTF you use Ubuntu but don't know what Nautilus is?!?!??
i just started with ubuntu, less than 1hr, but i use debian on all the servers, samba pdc with ldap backend and xp clients.
Nautilus is like the Konqueror for Gnome.
Boohbah : got it, won't be much help there, but i would be glad to help with samba if it comes down to it.
I want to browse samba shares with my Nautilus, though.
can you verify that samba is working correctly through both anonymous and username / password connections from the "server" and "client". if so, someone else should help.  if not, i will help.
pm me, as i don't know how and i will quickly walk you through it.
